body.p: the getClassifications service will generate a list of classifications available for a standard algorithm or free classification type scalar. It requires an algorithmoutputid or logid. Algorithmoutputids can be obtained from the getAlgorithms service.

tr.td: obtained through calling the getAlgorithms service
obtained through calling the getLogCollection service

body.p: A query for available classifications of the algorithmoutput with id 2 : getClassifications.html?algorithmoutputid=2
